page.title: 08DANESTONE (ABERDEEN)
page.content: The farms in Danestone have been taken over by Barratts and other housing companies.Now there are many houses built,but there are still some farms. There are many types of farms in Danestone which include dairy farms and arable farms. The houses that have been built are very modern,not like the old houses in Aberdeen which are built of granite. The houses are built near the River Don,and they overlook Bankhead and the river.Most of the houses are semi-det ached or detached.There are still houses going up,but people are already living in the houses that have been built.There are still old farm build- ings and original stane dykes and a few trees.The new houses have smaller rooms,but most have 3-4 bedrooms,kitc- hen,bathroom,living room & diningroom. They range from Â£37000-Â£78000.
